blog.name: bts-is-my-life-as-always
blog.title: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
blog.description: life is slowly hitting me, i've got decisions to make and i have to do it fast, so i'm starting to think that writing will be my way of escaping this world for a while, come join me?

title: Inbetween chapter 2.
body:
What is paradise?

prologue CHAPTER 1 CHAPTER 2 CHAPTER 3

summary: Your brother was only half, but 2 halves make a whole, you missed him dearly, his return was always waited, if only that reality was that simple, no one cares anymore, no one…

you tore yourself away from the painting, what could he have meant? you thought, as you sat down on your bed, you stared into the ceiling, well, the endless sky, the one place where your mind and heart could rest, but tonight it wasn’t very comforting, the butterfly mark on your arms seemed to glow, but you brushed it off as just your paranoia, at this very point you didn’t care, you rested your heavy eyelids and finally came to rest.

There are numerous ways in which God can make us lonely,

and lead us back to ourselves,

this was the way he dealt with me at that time.

You opened your eyes to what you knew was a dream, strange, very peculiar, angels are not able to dream, in fact angels are not even able to sleep let alone feel tired, you landed somewhere that was dark? very dark, so dark that you couldn’t even see your own arms, you started to walk, you reached your arms out trying to feel anything, sometime after you saw something bright, maybe not too bright in normal lighting but in this consumed darkness it looked extremely hopeful but sometimes the light makes the darkness even more fearful, at least if it was pure darkness the wonder inside of it wouldn’t be feared by the wonderer.

He stood tall, he looked confident yet sad, something about his presence made you both scared but also wanting to comfort him, a weird sense of calmness and a motherly instinct to cuddle it’s scared cubs but before you could even blink one more time, it came closer, the sudden brightness in front of you blinded you, the closer it got the less of it you could see and between the time of waking up and fading away from it, it whispered holding you closer.

“where have you been? I’ve truly missed you, i’ll come back for you, i promise”

You woke up confused, what was that? you questioned yourself.

once reality hit you, you knew you were in the one place you didn’t want to be, you opened your eyes and got out of bed, once ascending down the never ending stairs came to a halt you wondered what human life would feel like once again,

“good morning dear, what would you like for breakfast”

“good morning mum you don’t always have to get up just to make me breakfast, you don’t even have to eat, i can do it myself.”

“it’s my duty as a mum”

“duty? huh anyways where’s dad i have to talk to him about something”

“He’s in his studies as usual dear”

you ate as fast as you could and got up,as you walked towards your fathers studies you thought about your mother, duties? that’s what it is now duties, heaven is operated very differently to what human’s may think, you may think of a single God who sits on a throne all day long and rules over the world, and the angels are all robots that sit and do whatever they are told, however the actual heaven is the future that earth wants, there is only one God but he sits in his office like a typical kdrama CEO’s father he doesn’t have a throne, he’s more like a typical wealthy father but no one truly knows who God is except for the people closest to him, he is not able to decipher his loved ones emotions or minds whereas strangers or people he does not love he is fully able to. hence the reason why he is able to control them or abandon them, those who are abandoned are sent to the deepest darkest realm which is forbidden to be talked about in heaven, you were always his favourite and you didn’t like it, while your siblings were able to go out into the wilderness that was earth and enjoy the luxuries of humanity, you never once stepped foot outside of the prison disguised as heaven, you had been trapped for over centuries, at this point you had no idea what age you were, as each birthday passed they slowly forgot about it, you knew you didn’t belong here, you were so different at one point in time you heard your parents talk about how you would be a better candidate for human than angel, you arrived in front of his studies without even realising, you entered the door shoving the thoughts down the back of your head.

“father jimin has sent in a report from earth he says his departure was delayed due to circumstances that he can not specify and as it seems that he hasn’t broken any protocol I’ve told him to stay”

“okay dear, i’m sure he’s fine”

“but aren’t you worried about him? you must be? he’s your son”

“well, being worried doesn’t necessarily mean i can send anyone to figure out what happened that’s not how things work and your old enough to know that.”

“aren’t you the slightest bit worried? he’s your son, scrap that he’s my brother and i’m worried, yeah i told him to go ahead but your the one that told me its too dangerous to remain on earth, i mean isn’t that why i’m still here?”

“enough is enough, you are not to be sent to earth, your just different, no more but’s, if’s or wants, listen, this place doesn’t just operate on what you want, i get it, you may leave the room now” you looked down, not being able to believe the fact that even now, centuries since your birth, it’s just like the first day you requested to do what every other angel has done at least once in their lives but you weren’t even able to see the beginning,

“your the same, the same as them, your no different” and with that you left, what did you mean? you yourself didn’t know, whatever it meant, it meant a lot to you, however words are just pure words, it’ll never make a difference in your life, trapped in eternal hell, just waiting, waiting for the one person to come and save you, who? you don’t know, all you know is your brother must be happy away from here, that’s why he doesn’t want to come back, no matter how different your mothers were, he was you and you were him, and now he’s left you, left you to be happy, without you.

“ where have you been? I’ve truly missed you, i’ll come back for you, i promise” still rang in your ears like it was said to you in person.

i’ve missed you guys…

“enough is enough, you are not to be sent to earth, your just different, no more but’s, if’s or wants, listen, this place doesn’t just operate on what you want, i get it, you may leave the room now” you looked down, not being able to believe the fact that even now, centuries since your birth, it’s just like the first day you requested to do what every other angel has done at least once in their lives but you weren’t even able to see the beginning,

“your the same, the same as them, your no different” and with that you left, what did you mean? you yourself didn’t know, whatever it meant, it meant a lot to you, however words are just pure words, it’ll never make a difference in your life, trapped in eternal hell, just waiting, waiting for the one person to come and save you, who? you don’t know, all you know is your brother must be happy away from here, that’s why he doesn’t want to come back, no matter how different your mothers were, he was you and you were him, and now he’s left you, left you to be happy, without you.

“ where have you been? I’ve truly missed you, i’ll come back for you, i promise” still rang in your ears like it was said to you in person.

i’ve missed you guys…

blog.name: hobi-wan-kenobts
blog.title: May the Bangtan force be with you !
blog.description: Fanart, Fanart everywhere ! If you like BTS, you are first, a person of good tastes, and second may like this trash blog 8D Sometimes somes Eruri appear too, suprise Motherfucker !

blog.name: kreactionsentertainment
blog.title: KEntertainment
blog.description:
Scenarios, Reactions, and Edits~ Open
BTS, Got7, The Boyz, Monsta X, & EXO

summary:
Kim Seokjin
He hasn't seen your daughter in a month. That's all it took for Seokjin to break down crying. When Jimin told you,...
body:
BTS Reaction: Daughter Surprising Them On Tour

Kim Seokjin

He hasn’t seen your daughter in a month. That’s all it took for Seokjin to break down crying. When Jimin told you, you knew you had to take her to see him.

At seven years old, it was hard for your daughter, too, but she is at least old enough now to understand why her appa was away all the time. Doesn’t mean the pain didn’t come out of her eyes.

She couldn’t wait to see him after so long. You two were supposed to see Jin before the concert because Jimin wasn’t sure if he could fake more smiles to surprise him after.

Sneaking up behind him, your daughter wraps her arms around his waist.

“What?” he says in shock, “Princess! I’ve missed you!”

Picking her up and spinning around, Seokjin met with another present: a flower crown.

“I made it for you, Appa. Do you like it?” she shyly asks.

“I love it. I love you, too.”

Min Yoongi

Telling Yoongi that you were coming to a concert and being unable to keep the promise was your worst fear. Whether it be for his sake or your five year old’s, breaking either of their hearts would break yours.

So you decided the surprise would be for both of them. Walking into the stadium is when your daughter saw the BTS t-shirts. Now it was just Yoongi who didn’t know. You wondered if he would also bounce like she did.

You were wrong. Namjoon was the only member that knew beforehand. Just when the time was right, he told his hyung to look at your direction. Almost immediately after realizing, Yoongi’s face was covered in tears.

Eventually, he calmed down enough to wave at the bouncing girl, but Hoseok had to tell the audience who was here. Collective coos of joy were followed by Yoongi speaking.

“Thank you for being here. You have changed my life in such incredible ways. I love you.”

Jung Hoseok

Safe to say, your three year old has a wild imagination. Of course, with her dad being who he is, it didn’t shock anyone. It was especially cute when she called Hoseok a “singing astronaut”.

It all began when you showed your daughter the ‘Daydream’ music video. She is dead set on believing that J-Hope is his space name, no matter what you told her.

That’s why, when you took her to an arena instead of a space station for the concert, she was a little surprised. Not to mention her father was, too.

“How’s my sunshine?”

She doesn’t hear him because she’s looking around in awe. After a while, she asks him a question instead of answering his, pointing at the crowd she can see through the curtains.

“Appa, are those lights stars?”

“No, but it looks like the sky sometimes.”

Giggling, your daughter’s distracted for a moment. Hoseok whispers in your ear:

“She’s so cute. Thank you for bringing her.”

Kim Namjoon

Your six year old daughter always found early videos of Namjoon hysterical. There’s no way that her goofy appa was ever able to look intimidating. He loved hearing that.

Performing for your little girl at home was one of his favorite hobbies, so you finally brought her to a show. It’s her first concert to be exact.

The thing is, you didn’t tell Joon. So there he was, on stage in front of thousands, doing a dorky stunt with one of the boys. This is even before he realized you were there.

“Appa and Uncle Jinnie are funny grown-ups.”

You had to agree with her. Of course, once Namjoon saw you both, you could tell he wanted to cry. Knowing your daughter, however, she would be worried if she saw tears, so he just got weirder. He was even worse than the maknaes. Everyone loved it, though.

After the show, she took Namjoon’s face in her hands and said:

“I can teach you how to be serious, appa.”

No one knows how he kept a straight expression.

Park Jimin

It was possible that everyone knew that your four year old daughter would have more charms than even her father, but it was never directly spoken of. And just like Jimin, she knows how to use it to her advantage.

That’s why, when you brought up that you were going to surprise him at a concert, she picked out her very best outfit. She wanted to give a performance and show her appa what she learned in dance class.

You hadn’t even thought to tell her she couldn’t go on stage. When the day came, she bursts backstage, ready for her makeup. Jimin couldn’t believe it.

“You look so pretty! What are you dressed up for, angel?”

“I’m going to dance for you!” she says proudly, “In front of everyone!”

“Really? Let’s see what you have first,” he laughs.

You give him a small look.

“Maybe in a few years, though.”

No one can resist her cuteness, not even the original cutie himself.

Kim Taehyung

Out of all the boys, it was said that Tae would be the best father. He didn’t think so. Maybe Seokjin or Hoseok but not him. It’s his biggest insecurity, you’ve come to learn. Which was crazy to you. Until you talked to him one night.

Since your daughter was born two years ago, Taehyung has spent nearly five hundred days on the road. He isn’t there enough and she is going to forget him, he told you. Obviously, you always Skyped him and played his music for her, but that didn’t reassure Tae at all. So you hatched an idea.

Painting is her specialty. Not that the “I love you, Appa” on the sign was visible when she was down with her personal touches, but it’s the thought that counts. You just to write it on your own poster to hold.

When he saw it, his eyes lit up. The seats you had weren’t even that good and you could see it. He was the last to speak during the ending speeches and he used part of it to talk to you two.

“My loves. Thank you so much for loving me and coming here. I promise to do better.”

Jeon Jungkook

Neither of you had planned on having a child, it just happened. Still, here you are, a little over a year after your little girl turned one. Jungkook has only one regret: missing every first with her.

Her first crawl, walk, and tooth were all missed because of his schedules. As you told him over the phone about her babbles, he was concerned that her first word would also be without him. You weren’t having any of it.

Packing enough for a week’s time, you head for his next tour location. If anything, BTS would be her first concert. On the plane ride, you talked to her:

“Okay, sweetheart. I know I shouldn’t say this, but wait to talk. For Appa.”

He was so happy to see you both, but he had to get ready, meaning he couldn’t hold her for long. Giving her back to you, he sighed deeply. It wasn’t a minute, though, until she started protesting.

“Ah. Ah. Pa. Pa.”

“Wha-What?” Jungkook turns his head sharply, stuttering through tears.

“Ah. Pa. APPA!”

Safe to say, he smiled the whole night.

Admin Destiny 💜

reblog.comment:
BTS Reaction: Daughter Surprising Them On Tour

Kim Seokjin

He hasn’t seen your daughter in a month. That’s all it took for Seokjin to break down crying. When Jimin told you, you knew you had to take her to see him.

At seven years old, it was hard for your daughter, too, but she is at least old enough now to understand why her appa was away all the time. Doesn’t mean the pain didn’t come out of her eyes.

She couldn’t wait to see him after so long. You two were supposed to see Jin before the concert because Jimin wasn’t sure if he could fake more smiles to surprise him after.

Sneaking up behind him, your daughter wraps her arms around his waist.

“What?” he says in shock, “Princess! I’ve missed you!”

Picking her up and spinning around, Seokjin met with another present: a flower crown.

“I made it for you, Appa. Do you like it?” she shyly asks.

“I love it. I love you, too.”

Min Yoongi

Telling Yoongi that you were coming to a concert and being unable to keep the promise was your worst fear. Whether it be for his sake or your five year old’s, breaking either of their hearts would break yours.

So you decided the surprise would be for both of them. Walking into the stadium is when your daughter saw the BTS t-shirts. Now it was just Yoongi who didn’t know. You wondered if he would also bounce like she did.

You were wrong. Namjoon was the only member that knew beforehand. Just when the time was right, he told his hyung to look at your direction. Almost immediately after realizing, Yoongi’s face was covered in tears.

Eventually, he calmed down enough to wave at the bouncing girl, but Hoseok had to tell the audience who was here. Collective coos of joy were followed by Yoongi speaking.

“Thank you for being here. You have changed my life in such incredible ways. I love you.”

Jung Hoseok

Safe to say, your three year old has a wild imagination. Of course, with her dad being who he is, it didn’t shock anyone. It was especially cute when she called Hoseok a “singing astronaut”.

It all began when you showed your daughter the ‘Daydream’ music video. She is dead set on believing that J-Hope is his space name, no matter what you told her.

That’s why, when you took her to an arena instead of a space station for the concert, she was a little surprised. Not to mention her father was, too.

“How’s my sunshine?”

She doesn’t hear him because she’s looking around in awe. After a while, she asks him a question instead of answering his, pointing at the crowd she can see through the curtains.

“Appa, are those lights stars?”

“No, but it looks like the sky sometimes.”

Giggling, your daughter’s distracted for a moment. Hoseok whispers in your ear:

“She’s so cute. Thank you for bringing her.”

Kim Namjoon

Your six year old daughter always found early videos of Namjoon hysterical. There’s no way that her goofy appa was ever able to look intimidating. He loved hearing that.

Performing for your little girl at home was one of his favorite hobbies, so you finally brought her to a show. It’s her first concert to be exact.

The thing is, you didn’t tell Joon. So there he was, on stage in front of thousands, doing a dorky stunt with one of the boys. This is even before he realized you were there.

“Appa and Uncle Jinnie are funny grown-ups.”

You had to agree with her. Of course, once Namjoon saw you both, you could tell he wanted to cry. Knowing your daughter, however, she would be worried if she saw tears, so he just got weirder. He was even worse than the maknaes. Everyone loved it, though.

After the show, she took Namjoon’s face in her hands and said:

“I can teach you how to be serious, appa.”

No one knows how he kept a straight expression.

Park Jimin

It was possible that everyone knew that your four year old daughter would have more charms than even her father, but it was never directly spoken of. And just like Jimin, she knows how to use it to her advantage.

That’s why, when you brought up that you were going to surprise him at a concert, she picked out her very best outfit. She wanted to give a performance and show her appa what she learned in dance class.

You hadn’t even thought to tell her she couldn’t go on stage. When the day came, she bursts backstage, ready for her makeup. Jimin couldn’t believe it.

“You look so pretty! What are you dressed up for, angel?”

“I’m going to dance for you!” she says proudly, “In front of everyone!”

“Really? Let’s see what you have first,” he laughs.

You give him a small look.

“Maybe in a few years, though.”

No one can resist her cuteness, not even the original cutie himself.

Kim Taehyung

Out of all the boys, it was said that Tae would be the best father. He didn’t think so. Maybe Seokjin or Hoseok but not him. It’s his biggest insecurity, you’ve come to learn. Which was crazy to you. Until you talked to him one night.

Since your daughter was born two years ago, Taehyung has spent nearly five hundred days on the road. He isn’t there enough and she is going to forget him, he told you. Obviously, you always Skyped him and played his music for her, but that didn’t reassure Tae at all. So you hatched an idea.

Painting is her specialty. Not that the “I love you, Appa” on the sign was visible when she was down with her personal touches, but it’s the thought that counts. You just to write it on your own poster to hold.

When he saw it, his eyes lit up. The seats you had weren’t even that good and you could see it. He was the last to speak during the ending speeches and he used part of it to talk to you two.

“My loves. Thank you so much for loving me and coming here. I promise to do better.”

Jeon Jungkook

Neither of you had planned on having a child, it just happened. Still, here you are, a little over a year after your little girl turned one. Jungkook has only one regret: missing every first with her.

Her first crawl, walk, and tooth were all missed because of his schedules. As you told him over the phone about her babbles, he was concerned that her first word would also be without him. You weren’t having any of it.

Packing enough for a week’s time, you head for his next tour location. If anything, BTS would be her first concert. On the plane ride, you talked to her:

“Okay, sweetheart. I know I shouldn’t say this, but wait to talk. For Appa.”

He was so happy to see you both, but he had to get ready, meaning he couldn’t hold her for long. Giving her back to you, he sighed deeply. It wasn’t a minute, though, until she started protesting.

“Ah. Ah. Pa. Pa.”

“Wha-What?” Jungkook turns his head sharply, stuttering through tears.

“Ah. Pa. APPA!”

Safe to say, he smiled the whole night.

Masterlist I update every third Friday.

(1)

summary: {6/?} There's more to come~ An AU where Jimin is a CEO of a multi-billionaire company at the young age of 22. Making himself one...
body:
{6/?} There’s more to come~

An AU where Jimin is a CEO of a multi-billionaire company at the young age of 22. Making himself one of the most sought-after bachelors in South Korea.

While Jungkook is a struggling college student who loves being soft and babied. And being called pretty and cute.

blog.name: uwudotjpg
blog.title: A Mess
blog.description: My spam blog tbh

summary: The kpop discourse of the day
body:
The kpop discourse of the day

If your idol is rumored to or is confirmed to have a romantic partner and that makes you mad/sad you aren’t a real fan. I don’t care how much you love that idol, if seeing them in a happy healthy relationship upsets you, you do not love that idol. Instead you lust over them like a horny disrespectful freak. Appreciate idols for their personality and talent, not because you want them to be your boyfriend and they “MUST BE MINE DADDY PLEASE”. I’m not saying being a hard stan and fantasizing about dating an idol is bad but if that gets in the way of you letting an idol be happy than you are a bad person. That’s it have a nice day respect your idols and let them live happily.

Edit: @jungttoast and some other user who i forgot their @ brought it to my attention that I probably shouldnt shame people or be like “fake fan!!1!1!” for what they feel which is true, I shouldn’t. SO: if you do get upset over it, don’t attack that idol, don’t attack their partner. Just leave it alone and let them be and everything will be fine. Just be respectful yall thats my point here mostly. Support your idols decisions and dont just drop them cuz they found someone to make them happy.

The kpop discourse of the day

If your idol is rumored to or is confirmed to have a romantic partner and that makes you mad/sad you aren’t a real fan. I don’t care how much you love that idol, if seeing them in a happy healthy relationship upsets you, you do not love that idol. Instead you lust over them like a horny disrespectful freak. Appreciate idols for their personality and talent, not because you want them to be your boyfriend and they “MUST BE MINE DADDY PLEASE”. I’m not saying being a hard stan and fantasizing about dating an idol is bad but if that gets in the way of you letting an idol be happy than you are a bad person. That’s it have a nice day respect your idols and let them live happily.

Edit: @jungttoast and some other user who i forgot their @ brought it to my attention that I probably shouldnt shame people or be like “fake fan!!1!1!” for what they feel which is true, I shouldn’t. SO: if you do get upset over it, don’t attack that idol, don’t attack their partner. Just leave it alone and let them be and everything will be fine. Just be respectful yall thats my point here mostly. Support your idols decisions and dont just drop them cuz they found someone to make them happy.
trail.content:
The kpop discourse of the day

If your idol is rumored to or is confirmed to have a romantic partner and that makes you mad/sad you aren’t a real fan. I don’t care how much you love that idol, if seeing them in a happy healthy relationship upsets you, you do not love that idol. Instead you lust over them like a horny disrespectful freak. Appreciate idols for their personality and talent, not because you want them to be your boyfriend and they “MUST BE MINE DADDY PLEASE”. I’m not saying being a hard stan and fantasizing about dating an idol is bad but if that gets in the way of you letting an idol be happy than you are a bad person. That’s it have a nice day respect your idols and let them live happily.

Edit: @jungttoast and some other user who i forgot their @ brought it to my attention that I probably shouldnt shame people or be like “fake fan!!1!1!” for what they feel which is true, I shouldn’t. SO: if you do get upset over it, don’t attack that idol, don’t attack their partner. Just leave it alone and let them be and everything will be fine. Just be respectful yall thats my point here mostly. Support your idols decisions and dont just drop them cuz they found someone to make them happy.
